CommCon 2018

25th - 29th June 2018

The UK's only Open-Source Real-Time
Communications Conference

Wotton House, Surrey, UK

Menu options

Your ticket for CommCon includes Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner every day. Breakfast will consist of the usual hot and cold options - buffet style and lunch will be much like other conferences with hot food being served in the restaurant.

We have two different options for dinner every night as well as options for Vegetarians. If you have any special requirements to do with your food, please let us know at contact@commcon.xyz. Please see below for the food options every night.

Menu

Monday

Option 1
Starter

Sliced Sweet Potato Fritter served with Lemon labine, carrot and coriander salad and toasted pine kernels

Main

Sunday Roast Beef served with tender stem broccoli, red cabbage, and rosti potato & Yorkshire pudding

Desert

Apple and Pear Crumble with clotted cream ice cream, salted caramel

Option 2
Starter

Gateau of feta cheese & sweet peppers topped with a rocket salad & herb oil

Main

Salmon supreme creamed leek sauce

Desert

Crème brulee finished with a short bread biscuit

Vegetarian Option 1
Starter

Sliced Sweet Potato Fritter served with Lemon labine, carrot and coriander salad and toasted pine kernels

Main

Jacket potato

Desert

Apple and Pear Crumble with clotted cream ice cream, salted caramel

Vegetarian Option 2
Starter

Gateau of feta cheese & sweet peppers topped with a rocket salad & herb oil

Main

Stuffed baked pepper. Stuffed with ratatouille & finished with tomato jus

Desert

Crème brulee finished with a short bread biscuit

Tuesday

Option 1
Starter

Traditional prawn cocktail with Mary-rose sauce

Main

Roasted breast of Chicken served with boulangere potato, roasted ratatouille and basil dressing

Desert

Sticky Toffee Pudding

Option 2
Starter

Tomato Soup

Main

Toad in the Hole served with chef’s selection of vegetables & potato

Desert

Spotted Dick

Vegetarian Option 1
Starter

Salad of Heritage Beetroot. Pickled and roasted, orange, candied walnut and baby leaf salad

Main

Goat’s cheese & sweet butter nut squash en croute finished with a herb cream

Desert

Sticky Toffee Pudding

Vegetarian Option 2
Starter

Tomato Soup

Main

Wild Mushroom and Truffle Risotto served with grana, onion and parsley

Desert

Spotted Dick

Wednesday

Hog Roast

There will be vegetarian options for the Hog Roast as well.

Thursday

Option 1
Starter

Mushroom aranchini, truffle egg yolk, roquet, sherry vinegar reduction

Main

Pan-seared seatrout served with crushed new potatoes and a white wine sauce

Desert

Profiteroles filled with cream & topped with a rich dark chocolate sauce

Option 2
Starter

Main

Desert
